ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package small curd cottage cheese

cookingTips: Cottage cheese creates a tender, flaky dough different from traditional laminated crescent rolls
Chill dough thoroughly between rolling and shaping for easier handling
Roll thinly and sprinkle Parmesan generously before rolling into crescents
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through working with cottage cheese dough and explain how it creates uniquely tender rolls with less hands-on lamination.
